en: So, keep an open mind - I know this doesn't quite suit the vision you had for your project. However, I conducted a bit of a survey. It turns out one of our niche audiences would really want to see this feature in your product.
I know that it might confused the more general audience of users, but these niche users would be avid, loyal fans if we added this. What do you think?
Better to know your niche than to make something no one needs, eh?
Well, I guess focusing on a wider audience isn't the worst idea.
